title: Thieves have created a brand new online economy... reselling stolen goods on eBay and Facebook
description:

The shoplifting epidemic in New York has fueled a resale economy for websites like eBay, as retailers in the state are losing $4.4 billion a year.

title: Columbia holding segregated graduation ceremonies for Latinx and lavender people... wait, what the deuce are "lavender people?"
description:
Graduation ceremonies are a way for students to celebrate their achievements and dedication to the work they have put in towards academic discipline. It‚Äôs a symbolic way to show pride in one's achievements.

That said, graduation ceremonies are one of the most boring things to sit through in life - no matter who it is for. So much so that I refused to attend my own college graduation. Nonetheless, these events are something that has been going on for a very long time.

And at one point in American History, segregated graduation ceremonies were a thing.

We all know the biggest proponents back then for segregated ceremonies were Democrats. So of course, Progressives are the ones trying to desperately bring back this abhorrent ‚Äútradition.‚Äù

title: Police department uses "Lego Heads" on mugshots to comply with (and mock) California's silly new law
description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Progressives in California love felons. So much so that lawmakers spend a good chunk of their time finding ways to encourage lawlessness and make the lives of those living the thug life more easy. One of those ways is through a state law that hides the identity of criminals by preventing any police department in the state from releasing "nonviolent" mugshots.

A local police department has released mugshots of suspects but got a little creative and posted them with Lego heads to comply with the insanity of state law.

title: "I don't have to be nice to you": Parent torches school board, wins the internet with this lesson on Free Speech
